en: The amount of carbon dioxide emitted
The number of plants on Earth
yo: Iwọn oksailu kọnkẹẹdi ti a tu silẹ
Nọmba awọn ohun ọgbin lori ilẹ
ha: Adadin iskar oxygen da ake samarwa
Adadin iskar carbon dioxide da ake fitarwa

answer.en: The amount of carbon dioxide emitted
answer.yo: Iwọn oksailu kọnkẹẹdi ti a tu silẹ
answer.ha: Adadin iskar carbon dioxide da ake fitarwa

explanation.en: Carbon footprint measures the total carbon dioxide emissions caused by individuals or activities.
explanation.yo: Ẹsẹ-kárbọnu ṣe iwọn lapapọ awọn itujade oksailu kọnkẹẹdi ti eniyan tabi iṣẹ ṣe.
explanation.ig: Carbon footprint na-atụgharị na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke carbon dioxide mmadụ ma ọ bụ ihe omume na-eme.
explanation.ha: Sahihin carbon yana aunawa fitar iskar carbon dioxide da mutane ko ayyuka ke haifarwa.

question.en: Which of these contributes most to carbon emissions in Nigerian households?
question.yo: Ewo ninu awọn wọnyi ni o n ṣe alabapin julọ si itujade kárbọnu ni awọn ile Naijiria?
question.ig: Kedu ihe n’ime ndị a na-emetụta carbon emissions n’ezinụlọ Naijiria?
question.ha: Wanne daga cikin wadannan yana haifar da mafi yawan carbon a gidajen Najeriya?

explanation.en: Burning firewood is a common practice in Nigerian households and releases significant carbon dioxide.
explanation.yo: Ìjo igi jẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ tí wọ́n máa ń ṣe ni ile Naijiria, ó sì ń tu oksailu kónkẹẹdi pọ.
explanation.ig: Ịkụ ọkụ osisi bụ omume a na-ahụkarị na Naijiria na-ebute ikuku CO2 nke ukwuu.
explanation.ha: Hada itace yana daga cikin abubuwan da aka saba yi a Najeriya wanda ke haifar da yawan iskar carbon dioxide.

question.en: How can planting trees help reduce carbon emissions?
question.yo: Báwo ni gbígbìn igi ṣe le dinku itujade kárbọnu?
question.ig: Olee otú ịkụ osisi nwere ike ibelata carbon emissions?
question.ha: Ta yaya shuka itatuwa zai taimaka rage fitar da carbon?

yo: Igi máa ń gbé oksailu kọnkẹẹdi
Igi máa ń tu oksailu kọnkẹẹdi
Igi máa ń pọ́n ìtànná agbaye
Igi máa ń tu atẹgun ṣoṣo
ha: Itatuwa yana fitar da carbon dioxide
Itatuwa yana fitar da oxygen kawai

answer.yo: Igi máa ń gbé oksailu kọnkẹẹdi

explanation.en: Trees help combat carbon emissions by absorbing carbon dioxide and releasing oxygen.
explanation.yo: Igi ṣe iranwọ̀ lodi sí itujade kárbọnu nipa mímu oksailu kọnkẹẹdi gbé ati tú atẹgun.
explanation.ig: Osisi na-enyere aka belata carbon emissions site n’ịmị CO2 na ịtụpụ oxygen.
explanation.ha: Itatuwa yana taimakawa rage carbon ta hanyar shan carbon dioxide da fitar da oxygen.

question.en: What is one major source of carbon emissions in urban areas of Nigeria?
question.yo: Kí ni orísun kárbọnu pàtàkì kan ní àwọn ìlú ńlá Nàìjíríà?
question.ig: Kedu otu isi mmalite nke carbon emissions na obodo Nigeria?
question.ha: Menene babban tushe na fitar da carbon a biranen Najeriya?

explanation.en: Generators, often used due to unreliable electricity supply, emit significant carbon dioxide in Nigerian urban areas.
explanation.yo: Ẹ̀rọ ina monamona tí a máa ń lo nígbà tí agbára jẹ̀ aiṣe-dáṣọ̀tọ̀ ń tú oksailu kọnkẹẹdi ní àwọn ìlú ńlá Nàìjíríà.
explanation.ig: Jeniretọ ndị a na-eji maka enweghị ọkụ na-akpọpụta nnukwu CO2 na obodo dị na Nigeria.
explanation.ha: Janareto yana haifar da yawan fitar da carbon dioxide saboda rashin wutan lantarki mai tsaro.

question.en: Why is burning waste a concern for carbon emissions in Nigeria?
question.yo: Kí ló dé tí sisun àwòkọse di iṣoro nípa itujade kárbọnu ní Nàìjíríà?
question.ig: Kedu ihe mere ọkụkọ mkpofu ji bụrụ nsogbu maka carbon emissions na Nigeria?
question.ha: Me yasa kona shara ke haifar da matsala kan fitar da carbon a Najeriya?

yo: Ó máa ń tú oksailu kọnkẹẹdi
Ó máa ń dinku àwòkòṣe ilẹ̀
ig: Ọ na-eme ka ikuku dị ọcha

answer.yo: Ó máa ń tú oksailu kọnkẹẹdi

explanation.en: Burning waste releases harmful gases, including carbon dioxide, contributing to environmental pollution.
explanation.yo: Sisun àwòkọse máa ń tú gaasi tó ṣe ipalara, pẹ̀lú oksailu kọnkẹẹdi, tó ń mú àpáta ayé bàjẹ́.
explanation.ig: Ịkụ ọkụ mkpofu na-atụpụ ikuku ndị na-egbu egbu, tinyere CO2, nke na-eduga na mmetọ gburugburu ebe obibi.
explanation.ha: Kona shara yana sakin iskar gas mai cutarwa kamar carbon dioxide wanda ke lalata muhalli.

question.en: What is the environmental impact of gas flaring in Nigeria's oil industry?
question.yo: Kí ni ìpa ayé tó yẹ sí àtúnjúwe gasi ní ilé-iṣẹ́ epo Nàìjíríà?
question.ig: Kedu ihe mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke gas flaring na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ Nigeria?
question.ha: Menene illar flare na iskar gas a masana'antar man fetur ta Najeriya?

yo: Ó mú ilé àwọn ẹranko dàgbà
ig: Ọ na-eme ka ala dị mma
Ọ na-eme ka ebe obibi anụ ọhịa dị mma

explanation.en: Gas flaring in Nigeria's oil industry contributes to significant greenhouse gas emissions, affecting climate change.
explanation.yo: Àtúnjúwe gasi ní ilé-iṣẹ́ epo Nàìjíríà ń mú àìdá ilé-ọjọ́ kún fún àpáta ayé, tó ń nípa ayé.
explanation.ig: Ịtụpụ gas na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ Nigeria na-akpọpụta nnukwu ikuku ụlọ ọkụ nke na-emetụta mgbanwe ihu igwe.
explanation.ha: Flare na gas daga masana'antar man Najeriya yana taimakawa haifar da sauyin yanayi ta hanyar sakin iskar gas mai kara dumamar duniya.

question.en: Which farming practice in Nigeria contributes significantly to carbon emissions?
question.yo: Ẹ̀gbọ̀n ọdún àgbà tó ń ṣe àfikún kárbọnu kárí ayé ní Nàìjíríà ni yíyẹ wo?
question.ig: Kedu omume ugbo na Nigeria nke na-enyere aka na nnukwu carbon emissions?
question.ha: Wanne irin aikin gona ne a Najeriya ke haifar da yawan fitar carbon?

explanation.en: Slash-and-burn farming releases carbon dioxide and other harmful gases due to vegetation burning.
explanation.yo: Ẹ̀gbẹ́gbọ̀n àti sísun máa ń tú oksailu kọnkẹẹdi àti gaasi mìíràn tó ṣe ipalara sí ayé.
explanation.ig: Ọrụ ọkụ ala na-atụpụ CO2 na ikuku ndị ọzọ na-egbu egbu site na ọkụ osisi.
explanation.ha: Noma kona kasa yana sakin iskar carbon dioxide da wasu iskar gas masu cutarwa saboda kona tsirrai.

question.en: How does deforestation in Nigeria contribute to higher carbon levels?
question.yo: Báwo ni ìbájẹ́ igbó ṣe ń mú kárbọnu pọ̀ síi ní Nàìjíríà?
question.ig: Kedu ka ibelata ọhịa si enye aka na oke carbon na Nigeria?
question.ha: Ta yaya sare dazuzzuka a Najeriya ke kara yawan carbon?

en: It reduces trees that absorb carbon dioxide
yo: Ó dinku igi tó ń wọ́n oksailu kọnkẹẹdi
Ó pọ̀si agbára tí a le tún lo
ig: Ọ na-abawanye ume nke nwere ike ịzọpụta
Ọ na-eme ka ala dị mma
Ọ na-akwalite ụdịdị ihe dị ndụ
ha: Yana rage bishiyoyi da ke shakar carbon dioxide
Yana kara kuzarin da za'a iya sabuntawa

answer.en: It reduces trees that absorb carbon dioxide
answer.yo: Ó dinku igi tó ń wọ́n oksailu kọnkẹẹdi
answer.ha: Yana rage bishiyoyi da ke shakar carbon dioxide

explanation.en: Deforestation reduces the number of trees that naturally absorb carbon dioxide, leading to increased atmospheric carbon levels.
explanation.yo: Ìbájẹ́ igbó máa ń dinku iye igi tó ń wọ́n oksailu kọnkẹẹdi, tó ń mú kárbọnu pọ̀ sí afẹ́fẹ́.
explanation.ig: Ibelata ọhịa na-eme ka ọnụ ọgụgụ osisi na-etinye CO2 dị obere, nke na-eme ka carbon dị n'ikuku bawanye.
explanation.ha: Sare daji yana rage bishiyoyin dake shakar carbon dioxide wanda hakan ke kara iskar carbon a sararin samaniya.

question.en: Why is gas-powered electricity more carbon-intensive than solar power in Nigeria?
question.yo: Kí ló dé tí agbára itanna gasi pọ̀ síi ju oorun lọ ní Nàìjíríà?
question.ig: Kedu ihe mere ọkụ eletrik sitere na gas ji nwee nnukwu carbon karịa ọkụ anyanwụ na Nigeria?
question.ha: Me yasa amfani da wutar lantarki daga gas yafi karfin amfani da wutar rana wajen fitar da carbon a Najeriya?

en: Gas power emits more greenhouse gases
yo: Agbára gasi máa ń tú gaasi ilé-ọjọ́ kárí
Agbára oorun máa ń lo ilẹ̀ pọ̀ síi
Agbára gasi ni àtúnṣe diẹ sii
Agbára oorun máa ń ṣe agbára diẹ
ig: Ọkụ sitere na gas na-atụpụ nnukwu ikuku ụlọ ọkụ
Ọkụ sitere na gas nwere ume pụrụ iche
ha: Wutar gas tana fitar da greehouse mai yawa
Wutar rana tana bukatar filin kasa mai yawa
Wutar gas tana da sabuntawa sosai
Wutar rana tana samar da karamin kuzari

answer.en: Gas power emits more greenhouse gases
answer.yo: Agbára gasi máa ń tú gaasi ilé-ọjọ́ kárí
answer.ig: Ọkụ sitere na gas na-atụpụ nnukwu ikuku ụlọ ọkụ
answer.ha: Wutar gas tana fitar da greehouse mai yawa

explanation.en: Gas-powered electricity produces significant greenhouse gases during combustion, unlike solar power which is clean and renewable.
explanation.yo: Agbára itanna gasi máa ń tú gaasi ilé-ọjọ́ pẹ̀lú ìfunpọ̀, gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbára oorun tó mọ́ àti àtúnṣe.
explanation.ig: Ọkụ eletrik sitere na gas na-eme ka ikuku ụlọ ọkụ buru ibu, ebe ọkụ anyanwụ dị ọcha na nke nwere ike ịzọpụta.
explanation.ha: Amfani da gas wajen samar da wuta yana haifar da sakin iskar greehouse mai yawa fiye da amfani da wutar rana wacce bata fitar da iskar gas.
